t: Check out this Amazon review of Skype
s: Skype keeps me connected with family over seas. What a blessing to be able to see them as well as talk to them. Because of Skype I can prop up my computer where ever I am at, and my family and I can chat while I work, make dinner - they even sat in on a Christmas Dinner once.
